definition.text: The crypto exchanges node groups definitions of the different exchanges the user may interact with.

paragraphs.text: The default workspace features several nodes of this type, each with a purpose:
Tested: features Crypto Exchange nodes of exchanges that have been thoroughly tested.
Untested: features a collection of Crypto Exchange nodes of untested exchanges that comply with the set of API requirements of the CCXT library that Superalgos needs to function.
Testing Queue: you may use this node to deploy Crypto Exchange nodes while testing them.
